DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect infant formula high percentage palmitic acid sn-2 position ( InFat™ ) improve fat absorption general gastrointestinal tolerance Chinese formula-fed term infant .
DOC.brief_title: Effect InFat™ Product Stool Biochemistry Stool Characteristics Formula-fed Term Infants China
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study assess efficacy infant formula high percentage palmitic acid sn-2 position ( InFat™ ) compare standard vegetable oil base infant formula general gastrointestinal tolerance fat absorption , reduce calcium soap formation stool hardness Chinese formula-fed term infant .
DOC.criteria: Parental/legal guardian write informed consent ; The mother unequivocally decide breastfeed ( formula feed infant ) breastfeed ( human milk feed infant ) . Term infant Chinese origin born 3742 gestation week Birth weight appropriate gestational age ( AGA ) , 25004000grams The infant apparently healthy birth entry study . Adverse maternal , fetal infant medical history potentially affect efficacy parameter , tolerance , growth and/or development The infant singleton newborn
